implementation.token_handling: Auth0 tokens never exposed to frontend - handled server-side only

security_features: HttpOnly cookies prevent XSS token theft
CSRF protection with double-submit cookie pattern
auth0_integration: Frontend authenticates with Auth0 Universal Login
Backend exchanges Auth0 token for server-side session
User sync between Auth0 and MongoDB
Password management via Auth0 Management API
Auth0 roles mapped to application permissions
middleware: sessionAuth - Validates session cookie and loads user context
csrfProtection - Validates CSRF token on state-changing requests
tenantContext - Sets tenant context for multi-tenancy
applyScopeFiltering - Data filtering based on permissions

features: Super admin cross-tenant access with X-Tenant-Id header

tenant_context.super_admin_bypass: Can access any tenant with proper headers
tenant_context.isolation_enforcement: All queries automatically filtered by tenant_id

features: S3 deletion strategies (immediate vs tagged expiry)

recommendations: Implement rate limiting for public endpoints

CSRF protection on all state-changing operations
